summary: A curated community book platform where registered authors can upload books for free reading after admin approval. The sole admin reviews author profiles and book submissions, while authors retain limited editing rights (3 edits per book) and co-deletion privileges.
architectural_notes: Multi-role system: sole admin with full control, authors with limited upload/edit/delete rights
Two-stage approval: author profile approval, then individual book approval before publication
Edit limit tracking: each book tracks number of edits used by uploader (max 3 after publishing)
